title: Obelisk
description: Obelisk, now these guys want a piece of me! Come on!Obelisk wants to kill me. Normally Iâ€™d tell them to take a number,but while I was going head to head with dark mystical forces, rogue government agents, elite assassins, way more demon dogs than is reasonable, and a healthy spattering of villainous superpowered gangs; Obelisk put a plan in motion that threatens to free a whole new evil.Now the clocks run out and I have to stop whatever they are planning before they unleash it on my city. And the people I rely on end up dead.
author: Arthur Mayor
